anathema: Purify your food, cure a disease or kill a parasite, tolerate another demon lord or their servants (except  Treerazer )
edict: Corrupt all that exists with parasites or fungus, promote the growth of fungus, feast on rotten flesh or fungus
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Cyth-V'sug (Prince of the Blasted Heath)](/Deities.aspx?ID=74)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup>

Cyth-V’sug, Prince of the Blasted Heath, is the demon lord of disease, fungus, and parasites. Originally a qlippoth lord, he was exiled by his peers for accepting mortal worshippers. Transformed into one of the demons he despises, Cyth-V’sug seeks to devour all life to put an end to demons and, ultimately, himself. He most often appears as an enormous draconic figure of snarled vines, fungal growths, and flailing tentacles. Cyth-V’sug is most often worshipped by recluses who seek to bring decay and destruction to their environs, though denizens of the Darklands also pay homage to him.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** Corrupt all that exists with parasites or fungus, promote the growth of fungus, feast on rotten flesh or fungus

**Anathema** Purify your food, cure a disease or kill a parasite, tolerate another demon lord or their servants (except [Treerazer](/Deities.aspx?ID=26))

**Area of Concern**
disease, fungus, and parasites

**Follower Alignments**
CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

**Favored Weapon** [Scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=40), [Decay](/Domains.aspx?ID=42), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Plague](/Domains.aspx?ID=48)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Summon Plant or Fungus](/Spells.aspx?ID=325)

- **2nd**
[Fungal Hyphae](/Spells.aspx?ID=576)

- **5th**
[Plant Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=223)

</column>
name: Cyth-V'sug (Prince of the Blasted Heath)
